Overview

Prime Lessons provides a complete set of LEGO MINDSTORMS programming lessons for teams, teachers, and robotics enthusiasts. The tutorials are clear, to-the-point, and comprehensive, with something for every level of user.

Lessons

We provide a complete set of lessons for students, teachers, and teams. The lessons are organized into units and designed to be completed in order.

Robot Designs

This section provides robot designs that can be used with the lessons. Additional designs will be added over time.

About Us

Founded in 2020, SPIKE Prime Lessons is a premier site for learning to program the SPIKE Prime.
